member.name: T:YoloCSharp.Darknet
member.summary: Provides a Darknet detector which can be used to analyze image and find all detectable objects inside

member.name: M:YoloCSharp.Darknet.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new Darknet detector with the and the
member.param: The index of a CUDA compatible GPU

member.name: M:YoloCSharp.Darknet.Detect(OpenCvSharp.Mat,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Use to detect objects on an OpenCV Mat object and return all found objects
member.param: Threshold at which an object should be confirmed

member.name: M:YoloCSharp.Darknet.Dispose
member.summary: Dispose method to close the darknet process

member.name: T:YoloCSharp.YoloResult
member.summary: Represents the detection information of an object by Yolo

member.name: P:YoloCSharp.YoloResult.X
member.value: X coordinate of the top-left corner of bounded box

member.name: P:YoloCSharp.YoloResult.Y
member.value: Y coordinate of the top-left corner of bounded box

member.name: P:YoloCSharp.YoloResult.Prob
member.value: Probability that the object was found correctly

member.name: P:YoloCSharp.YoloResult.ObjId
member.value: Class of object - from range [0, classes-1]

member.name: P:YoloCSharp.YoloResult.TrackId
member.value: Tracking id for video (0 - untracked, 1 - inf - tracked object)

member.name: P:YoloCSharp.YoloResult.FramesCounter
member.value: Counter of frames on which the object was detected
